website_summaries.verdict: Bring on that nostalgic feeling with the Puma Roma Basic +, one of the classic sneakers from Puma’s Roma collection. Aesthetically speaking, it looks just like the original Puma Roma kick. It comes with a soft leather upper that makes it great for walking, traveling, and even just standing for long hours. Because of its visually pleasing style, comfortable ride, and reasonable price tag, the Roma Basic + has become one of the sought-after kicks from Puma.
pros: A significant number of reviewers rave about how comfortable the Puma Roma Basic + is
The majority of purchasers find the style of this sneaker to be very attractive
Several consumers appreciate the vintage look of this kick
This shoe looks great with many different outfits, according to most users
Some wearers agree that this shoe feels lightweight, making it great for long walks
Plenty of those who own a pair of this sneaker agree that it is worth its price
A few users appreciate the padded sole of the Puma Roma Basic + sneaker
Numerous reviewers consider this kick as their everyday go-to footwear
A couple of commenters are satisfied with the arch and heel support from this shoe
Quite a few appreciate the inclusion of the T-toe overlays as it protects the foot from external impacts
cons: Plenty of wearers complain about the tight fit of the Puma Roma Basic +
A few consumers are annoyed with the squeaking sound that this shoe makes
Some notice that this shoe needs a bit of time to break-in

customer_reviews.title: tight, but right
customer_reviews.text: Reviews saying these run a bit small are true, so if other shoes normally are snug, move up a 1/2 size. I like a snug fit and have old wooden "shoe stretchers" so I'm fine. Was pleasantly surprised by how lightweight these are. They're definitely a "fashion shoe" these days but are much, much better than a typical Puma shoe was in the 1970s, including the Roma. Suede & heavy rubber were the brand's norm. You could do short runs in these, and I plan to (just for fun) with my local running group. The colors were slightly darker than I expected but it could be my screen/settings. Still fun & vibrant! Overall, I'm happy with the purchase.

product_meta.title: PUMA Men's Roma Basic + Sneaker
product_meta.description: From the PUMA archives in 1968, this lightweight training shoe was equipped with comfort enhancing features such as a thick padded tongue and orthopedic arch supports. This version features an all over leather upper and fresh spring colorways.
